topics.author: 4fe1b9f47f123b13df002976

topics.body:
Oh
And then Earth is just wished by back with the Namek dragon

Okay so I have to ask again how the Black Star Balls work
A year after the wish is made, the planet the wish was made on will explode in a year, unless they bring them back
And they do bring them back
Then what, does the planet not explode with the balls on them, if you wish again shouldn't it reset the timer
Well apparently it doesn't reset, so Earth explodes
Which would be fine, if the planet Tuffle was the new permanent planet, but Earth just gets wished back

Meaning that they blew up Earth, just to kill Piccolo for drama

Fuck off
topics.author: 4fe3df367f123b517900066a

topics.body:
They seriously just killed Piccolo, because they had nothing else to do with him
He shows up for, as far as I can recall, the first time in GT, and dies the same episode
